image_generation_prompt: A @woman is wearing a mint green floral print @top, white wide-leg pants, beige sandals and a brown woven handbag. The @woman stands confidently outside a chic boutique with large glass windows. She is looking to the side with a bright smile, her hair styled in a neat bun adorned with a decorative hairpin. The sunlight casts soft shadows on the stone pavement, and a few yellow leaves are scattered around. The overall aesthetic is casual and elegant, with a touch of summer charm.
